message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to keep my investment within $12,000. Would you be willing to consider a counteroffer of $12,000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. Could you do $13,000?

I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I'm still hoping to keep my investment within $12,000. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between our previous offers at $12,500?
